item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Montana
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Cooper
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Circoloco
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Harmour
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Patagonia
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com

item.title: Balenciaga
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
Satchels

coffee

Satchels Coffee is a premium coffee brand that focuses on delivering a rich and aromatic experience. Our blends are carefully sourced from the finest coffee-growing regions, ensuring quality and sustainability.

The project description
01
Our work highlights the rich heritage of coffee, using earthy tones and modern typography to create an inviting aesthetic. We focused on storytelling through vibrant illustrations. Services : Branding, Product Published : 20 January 2023 Client : ThemeZaa, UK Brand overview
02
Identity

The logo is designed to be effective across various mediums, from packaging to digital platforms.

Packaging

The packaging for Satchels Coffee is designed to reflect our artisanal approach. Each bag features a matte finish.

Campaign

The marketing campaign for Satchels Coffee revolves around the theme brewed for connection.

www.satchelscoffee.com New project in mind? info@domain.com
